reference.title: Open Source File
reference.shortdesc: Opens in the Eclipse IDE a Java source file associated with a class.

refbody.section: Motivation If Memory Analyzer is installed into the Eclipse IDE, then the Eclipse IDE might have a workspace containing Java source files associated with classes in the snapshot. This query goes from the class in the snapshot and opens the source file of interest.

strow.stentry: No arguments, but the query must be operated on a single class or object or on a method in a stack trace in the snapshot.

section.title: Result
section.p: If the class is present in the Eclipse IDE workspace then the editor will be opened on the class. If not, then an error message such as Type java.lang.Thread not found in workspace appears in a dialog.
